channel.title: [317] Need help with getting my server started [317]
channel.description: [b]i have a 317 source and client just i need help to start off my server how to put it online cause im having hard time with it... and i wanted to know if i can use hamachi... i know its slow and cheap but its just to start off getting to script and stuff if anyone would be nice enough give me msn? or help here? thanks[/b]

not using hamachi to make players play just trying to get my server online
test it…

and now evrytime i use any client i get a error

i use mopar,silab or this other client i get black page says loading please wait…
and my page stay black.

help!

error:

item.title: [317] Need help with getting my server started [317]
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Hamachi is easy to use.

Download hamachi
Create a network
Create a network password
Run your server
Connect to localhost (tell your friends to connect to your hamachi network & to use your hamachi ip address).

Then your server will be online & your friends can come play your server with you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Need help with getting my server started [317]
item.dc:creator: @elvemaqe elvemaqe
item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

dont know nothing about hamachi,
but if u wanna get it online, you should portforward.

so go to run in start, do cmb
then type ipconfig

take ur gateaway or ip not sure, log in into ur router most of time it is admin/ admin or user/user.

open port by virtuel server to 43594 and ends with 43594

then make a no-ip download by no-ip.com download the the proggams,
register and make an now ip.
run it and every 1 can log in
